# MPMediaPlaylistAttribute

**Structure**

Attributes define the type of playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MPMediaPlaylistAttribute
```

## Overview

Playlist attributes to use as possible values for the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPlaylistPropertyPlaylistAttributes] property.

## Constants

- **onTheGo**: A playlist created on a device rather than synced from the Music app.
- **smart**: A smart playlist includes items that match one or more user-specified rules.
- **genius**: A Genius playlist includes items related to other items in your Music library.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

## Retrieving information about a playlist

- **authorDisplayName**: The display name for the playlist defined in the app.
- **descriptionText**: User supplied text that describes the playlist.
- **name**: The name of the playlist.
- **persistentID**: The persistent identifier for the playlist.
- **cloudGlobalID**: The cloud identifier for the playlist.
- **playlistAttributes**: The attributes associated with the playlist.
- **seedItems**: The items seeded to generate the playlist; applies only to Genius playlists.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
